mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hybrid_board(psnum, num, subject, content, bdtype, thumbnail hitCount, ipaddr, reg_date, blind) VALUES (hybrid_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{bdtype}, #{thumbnail}, 0, #{ipaddr}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM HYBRID_BOARD hb JOIN MEMBER m ON hb.num = m.num
AND blind = 0 AND bdtype = #{bdtype}

SELECT hb.psnum, m.num, m.id, nickname, subject, content, TO_CHAR(hb.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date, hb.blind, hitCount, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount FROM HYBRID_BOARD hb JOIN MEMBER m ON hb.num = m.num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT rpnum, COUNT(*) replyCount, ps_num, rpblind FROM HYBRID_BOARD_REPLY WHERE rpblind = 0 GROUP BY rpnum, ps_num, rpblind ) c ON hb.psnum = c.ps_num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT psnum, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM HYBRID_BOARD_FAV GROUP BY psnum ) b ON hb.psnum = b.psnum
AND bdtype = #{bdtype} AND blind = 0
ORDER BY psnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT hb.psnum, hb.num, nickname, subject, content, hitCount, hb.reg_date, hb.blind, bdtype FROM HYBRID_BOARD hb JOIN MEMBER m ON hb.num = m.num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) replyCount, ps_num, rpblind FROM HYBRID_BOARD_REPLY WHERE rpblind = 0 GROUP BY ps_num, rpblind ) r ON hb.psnum = r.ps_num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT psnum, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM HYBRID_BOARD_FAV WHERE psnum = #{psnum} GROUP BY psnum ) c ON hb.psnum = c.psnum WHERE hb.psnum = #{psnum} AND blind = 0 AND bdtype = #{bdtype}
mapper.update: UPDATE HYBRID_BOARD SET hitCount = hitCount + 1 WHERE psnum = #{psnum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HYBRID_BOARD_FAV WHERE psnum = #{psnum} AND num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HYBRID_BOARD_REPLY (rpnum, rpcontent, rpreg_date, ps_num, num, rpblind) VALUES (hybrid_board_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rpcontent}, SYSDATE, #{psnum}, #{num}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM HYBRID_BOARD_REPLY WHERE ps_num = #{psnum} AND rpblind = 0

SELECT r.rpnum, r.rpcontent, r.rpreg_date, r.ps_num, rpblind, r.num, m.nickname, m.profile_image, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount, NVL(disLikeCount, 0) disLikeCount, COALESCE(rplike, -1) rplike FROM HYBRID_BOARD_REPLY r JOIN member m ON r.num = m.num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT rpnum, rplike, COUNT(DECODE(rplike, 1, 1)) likeCount, COUNT(DECODE(rplike, 0, 1)) disLikeCount FROM HYBRID_BOARD_LIKE GROUP BY rpnum, rplike ) c ON r.rpnum = c.rpnum WHERE r.ps_num = #{psnum} AND r.rpblind = 0 ORDER BY r.rpnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HYBRID_BOARD_LIKE (rpnum, num, rplike) VALUES(#{rpnum}, #{num}, #{rplike})
